step.send_false_to: Drug Check Failure - RPC not reachable 2

step.name: Table input
step.sql: select (select value from app_configuration where key = 'ERX_URL')|| (select value from app_configuration where key = 'DRGCHK_RS_URI')as url, '{"ndcUPN":"'||decode(nvl(drug_info.productCodeQual, drug_info.productCodeQualResponse), 'M', null, nvl2(nvl(drug_info.productCode, drug_info.productCodeResponse), nvl(drug_info.productCodeQual, drug_info.productCodeQualResponse),'')|| nvl2(nvl(drug_info.productCodeQual, drug_info.productCodeQualResponse),nvl2(nvl(drug_info.productCode, drug_info.productCodeResponse),'^',null),null)||nvl2(nvl(drug_info.productCodeQual, drug_info.productCodeQualResponse),nvl(drug_info.productCode, drug_info.productCodeResponse),''))||'",'|| '"drugDescription":"'||REGEXP_REPLACE ( CONVERT ( drug_info.drugDesc, 'US7ASCII', 'WE8ISO8859P1'), '[^!@/.,;:<>#$%&()_=[:alnum:][:blank:]]') ||'","division":"${PHARMACY_DIVISION}"}' as body, to_char(t.inbound_ncpdp_msg_id) inbound_ncpdp_msg_id, (nvl(extractValue(xmltype(nvl(t.drug_match_details,'<drugCheck/>')), '/drugCheck/runCount'),0) + 1) runCount, nvl((select value from app_configuration where key = 'VISTA_RETRY'),0) as retry from erx.inbound_ncpdp_msg t, xmltable('/Message' passing t.message columns drugDesc varchar2(105) path '//MedicationPrescribed/DrugDescription', productCode varchar2(35) path '//MedicationPrescribed/DrugCoded/ProductCode/Code', productCodeQual varchar2(1) path '//MedicationPrescribed/DrugCoded/ProductCode/Qualifier', drugDescResponse varchar2(105) path '//MedicationResponse/DrugDescription', productCodeResponse varchar2(35) path '//MedicationResponse/DrugCoded/ProductCode/Code', productCodeQualResponse varchar2(1) path '//MedicationResponse/DrugCoded/ProductCode/Qualifier') drug_info where t.inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID} --7778472 --${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID} --${PHARMACY_DIVISION}

error.target_step: Drug Check Failure - RPC not reachable

hop.to: EandE Check Failure 3 - RPC Not Reachable
EandE Check Failure 2 2 - RPC Not Reachable

step.name: EandE Check Failure
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0102', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck>' ||(select EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<mvi/>')),'//mvi')|| EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<siteMatch/>')),'//siteMatch') from inbound_ncpdp_msg where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID})|| '<eande> <eligibilityStatus>?</eligibilityStatus> <enrollmentStatus>?</enrollmentStatus> <errorMessage>?</errorMessage> <runCount>${RUNCOUNTEE}</runCount> </eande> <success>false</success> </patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: EandE Check Failure 2 - Allow Retry
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0107', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck>' ||(select EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<mvi/>')),'//mvi')|| EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<siteMatch/>')),'//siteMatch') from inbound_ncpdp_msg where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID})|| '<eande> <eligibilityStatus></eligibilityStatus> <enrollmentStatus></enrollmentStatus> <errorMessage></errorMessage> <runCount>${RUNCOUNTEE}</runCount> </eande> <success>false</success> </patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: EandE Check Failure 2 2 - RPC Not Reachable
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0103', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck>' ||(select EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<mvi/>')),'//mvi')|| EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<siteMatch/>')),'//siteMatch') from inbound_ncpdp_msg where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID})|| '<eande> <eligibilityStatus></eligibilityStatus> <enrollmentStatus></enrollmentStatus> <errorMessage>EandE_RETRIES_EXCEEDED_SERVICE_NOT_REACHABLE</errorMessage> <runCount>${RUNCOUNTEE}</runCount> </eande> <success>false</success> </patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: EandE Check Failure 3 - RPC Not Reachable
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0103', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck>' ||(select EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<mvi/>')),'//mvi')|| EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<siteMatch/>')),'//siteMatch') from inbound_ncpdp_msg where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID})|| '<eande> <eligibilityStatus>?</eligibilityStatus> <enrollmentStatus>?</enrollmentStatus> <errorMessage>EandE_RETRIES_EXCEEDED_SERVICE_NOT_REACHABLE</errorMessage> <runCount>${RUNCOUNTEE}</runCount> </eande> <success>false</success> </patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: EandE Check Failure 4 - Allow Retry
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0107', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck>' ||(select EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<mvi/>')),'//mvi')|| EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<siteMatch/>')),'//siteMatch') from inbound_ncpdp_msg where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID})|| '<eande> <eligibilityStatus>?</eligibilityStatus> <enrollmentStatus>?</enrollmentStatus> <errorMessage>System Error Occurred.</errorMessage> <runCount>${RUNCOUNTEE}</runCount> </eande> <success>false</success> </patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: EandE Check Success
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0101', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck>' ||(select EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<mvi/>')),'//mvi')|| EXTRACT(xmltype(nvl(patient_match_details,'<siteMatch/>')),'//siteMatch') from inbound_ncpdp_msg where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID})|| '<eande> <eligibilityStatus>?</eligibilityStatus> <enrollmentStatus>?</enrollmentStatus> <errorMessage>?</errorMessage> <runCount>${RUNCOUNTEE}</runCount> </eande> <success>${siteMatch}</success> </patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: Build Service URL
step.sql:
select (select value from app_configuration where key = 'ERX_URL')|| (select value from app_configuration where key = 'MVI_RS_URI')as url, '{"firstName":"'||TRANSLATE(patient_info.patient_first_name,'!@#$%^&*()\/,+"', ' ')||'",'|| '"middleName":"'||TRANSLATE(patient_info.patient_middle_name,'!@#$%^&*()\/,+"', ' ')||'",'|| '"lastName":"'||TRANSLATE(patient_info.patient_last_name,'!@#$%^&*()\/,+"', ' ')||'",'|| '"dateOfBirth":"'||decode(instr(patient_info.date_of_birth,'-',1),5,to_char(to_date(substr(patient_info.date_of_birth,1,10),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYYMMDD'),'99990909')||'",'|| '"address":"'||TRANSLATE(patient_info.address_line_1,'!@#$%^&*()\/,+"', ' ')||' ' ||TRANSLATE(patient_info.address_line_2,'!@#$%^&*()\/,+"', ' ')|| ', '||TRANSLATE(patient_info.city,'!@#$%^&*()\/,+"', ' ')|| ', '||patient_info.state|| ', '||patient_info.zipcode||'",'|| '"telephone":"'||TRANSLATE(nvl(patient_info.phone_number,patient_info.primary_phone_number),'!@#$%^&*()\/,+"', ' ')||'",'|| '"gender":"'||patient_info.patient_gender||'",'|| '"socSecNum":"'||TRANSLATE(patient_info.ssn,'!@#$%^&*()\/,+"', ' ')||'"}' as body, nvl((select substr(va_station_id,1,3) from pharmacy where ncpdp_id = patient_info.pharmacy_ncpdpid),'0') as va_station_id, nvl((select eande_check from pharmacy where ncpdp_id = patient_info.pharmacy_ncpdpid),'N') as eande_check, t.inbound_ncpdp_msg_id inbound_ncpdp_msg_id, (nvl(extractValue(xmltype(nvl(t.patient_match_details,'<mvi/>')), '//mvi/runCount'),0) + 1) runCountMVI, (nvl(extractValue(xmltype(nvl(t.patient_match_details,'<eande/>')), '//eande/runCount'),0) + 1) runCountEE, nvl((select value from app_configuration where key = 'MVI_EE_RETRY'),0) as retry from erx.inbound_ncpdp_msg t, xmltable('/Message' passing t.message columns patient_last_name varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/Name/LastName', patient_middle_name varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/Name/MiddleName', patient_first_name varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/Name/FirstName', patient_gender varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/Gender', date_of_birth varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/DateOfBirth/Date', address_line_1 varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/Address/AddressLine1', address_line_2 varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/Address/AddressLine2', city varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/Address/City', state varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/Address/StateProvince', zipcode varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/Address/PostalCode', ssn varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/Identification/SocialSecurity', phone_number varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/CommunicationNumbers/HomeTelephone', primary_phone_number varchar2(35) path '//Patient/HumanPatient/CommunicationNumbers/PrimaryTelephone', pharmacy_ncpdpid varchar2(30) path '//Header/To') patient_info where t.inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}
-- 7778379 ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}

step.name: EandE Check Skipped
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0108', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck> <mvi> <patientICN>?</patientICN> <errorMessage>?</errorMessage> <patientFirstName>?</patientFirstName> <patientMiddleName>?</patientMiddleName> <patientLastName>?</patientLastName> <patientSSN>?</patientSSN> <patientDateOfBirth>?</patientDateOfBirth> <patientStationIds>?</patientStationIds> <runCount>?</runCount></mvi> <siteMatch>true</siteMatch> </patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: MVI - Match Found - Site Registration Not Confirmed
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0106', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck> <mvi> <patientICN>?</patientICN> <errorMessage>?</errorMessage> <patientFirstName>?</patientFirstName> <patientMiddleName>?</patientMiddleName> <patientLastName>?</patientLastName> <patientSSN>?</patientSSN> <patientDateOfBirth>?</patientDateOfBirth> <patientStationIds>?</patientStationIds> <runCount>?</runCount></mvi> <siteMatch>?</siteMatch> </patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: MVI Match Found
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0001', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck> <mvi> <patientICN>?</patientICN> <errorMessage>?</errorMessage> <patientFirstName>?</patientFirstName> <patientMiddleName>?</patientMiddleName> <patientLastName>?</patientLastName> <patientSSN>?</patientSSN> <patientDateOfBirth>?</patientDateOfBirth> <patientStationIds>?</patientStationIds> <runCount>?</runCount></mvi> <siteMatch>true</siteMatch> </patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: MVI Match Not Found
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0002', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck> <mvi> <patientICN>?</patientICN> <errorMessage>?</errorMessage> <patientFirstName>?</patientFirstName> <patientMiddleName>?</patientMiddleName> <patientLastName>?</patientLastName> <patientSSN>?</patientSSN> <patientDateOfBirth>?</patientDateOfBirth> <patientStationIds>?</patientStationIds> <runCount>?</runCount> </mvi> <success>false</success> </patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: MVI Service Call Failure - Allow Retry
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0004', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck><mvi> <errorMessage>MVI_SERVICE_NOT_REACHABLE_AWAITING_RETRY</errorMessage> <runCount>?</runCount> </mvi><success>false</success></patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.name: MVI Service Call Failure - RPC Not Reachable
step.sql: update inbound_ncpdp_msg set patient_chk_status = '0003', patient_match_details = '<patientCheck><mvi> <errorMessage>MVI_RETRIES_EXCEEDED_SERVICE_NOT_REACHABLE</errorMessage> <runCount>?</runCount> </mvi><success>false</success></patientCheck>' where inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}; commit;

step.sql: select t.inbound_ncpdp_msg_id, t.drug_chk_status drug_chk_status, t.provider_chk_status provider_chk_status, t.patient_chk_status patient_chk_status, nvl((select trim(va_station_id) from pharmacy where t.pharmacy_id = pharmacy_id),0) pharmacy_division, '3009' MESSAGE_STATUS_NEW from erx.inbound_ncpdp_msg t where t.message_status = '3001' and t.message is not null and (t.drug_chk_status = '1004' or t.provider_chk_status = '2004' or t.patient_chk_status in ('0004','0107'))

step.name: Generate random value for Message ID
Inbound eRx Messages to Process
step.sql: select x.message_id, t.inbound_ncpdp_msg_id, x.rel_to_message_id, (select inbound_ncpdp_msg_id from inbound_ncpdp_msg inb where inb.message_id = x.rel_to_message_id and inb.pharmacy_id = nvl((select pharmacy_id from pharmacy where ncpdp_id = x.pharmacy_ncpdpid),0) and x.message_type not in ('NewRx') and inb.received_date > sysdate - 365 and rownum < 2) rel_to_inbound_ncpdp_msg_id, (select outbound_ncpdp_msg_id from outbound_ncpdp_msg out where out.message_id = x.rel_to_message_id and x.message_type not in ('CancelRx') and out.received_date > sysdate - 365 and rownum < 2) rel_to_outbound_ncpdp_msg_id, x.message_type, nvl(nvl2(x.renewal_type,x.renewal_type||'-Check',null), 'Change'||x.change_type||decode(x.medication_req_cd,'P','-P', nvl2(x.change_type,'-Check',null))) response_type, xmlroot (t.message,version '1.0', standalone NO).getClobVal() message, nvl((select pharmacy_id from pharmacy where ncpdp_id = x.pharmacy_ncpdpid),0) pharmacy_id, nvl((select substr(va_station_id,1,3) from pharmacy where ncpdp_id = x.pharmacy_ncpdpid),0) pharmacy_division, nvl((select inbound_erx_enabled from pharmacy where ncpdp_id = x.pharmacy_ncpdpid),-1) pharmacy_enabled, nvl(x.npi1,'0000000000') provider_npi, x.clinic_id clinic_id, x.pharmacy_ncpdpid pharmacy_ncpdpid, CASE WHEN x.error_desc IN (SELECT value from app_configuration where key = 'ERR_SUPP_DLVRY') THEN '3007' WHEN x.error_desc NOT IN (SELECT value from app_configuration where key = 'ERR_SUPP_DLVRY') THEN '3001' WHEN x.error_desc IS NULL THEN '3001' END AS message_status_ready_to_send, '3009' message_status_new, '3006' message_status_xml_invalid, '3010' message_stat_pharm_not_enbld, '3011' message_stat_pharm_unknown, CASE WHEN x.error_desc IN (SELECT value from app_configuration where key = 'ERR_SUPP_DLVRY') THEN '0000' WHEN x.error_desc NOT IN (SELECT value from app_configuration where key = 'ERR_SUPP_DLVRY') THEN '0109' WHEN x.error_desc IS NULL THEN '0109' END AS patient_chk_na, CASE WHEN x.error_desc IN (SELECT value from app_configuration where key = 'ERR_SUPP_DLVRY') THEN '0000' WHEN x.error_desc NOT IN (SELECT value from app_configuration where key = 'ERR_SUPP_DLVRY') THEN '0105' WHEN x.error_desc IS NULL THEN '0105' END AS drug_chk_na, CASE WHEN x.error_desc IN (SELECT value from app_configuration where key = 'ERR_SUPP_DLVRY') THEN '0000' WHEN x.error_desc NOT IN (SELECT value from app_configuration where key = 'ERR_SUPP_DLVRY') THEN '2005' WHEN x.error_desc IS NULL THEN '2005' END AS provider_chk_na, '${NCPDP_XSD}' ncpdp_xsd_path, to_date(nvl(decode(substr(nvl(x.written_date,x.written_date_time),0,INSTR(nvl(x.written_date,x.written_date_time),'T')-1),null,nvl(x.written_date,x.written_date_time),substr(nvl(x.written_date,x.written_date_time),0,INSTR(nvl(x.written_date,x.written_date_time),'T')-1)),(to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))),'YYYY-MM-DD') + 365 written_date_test, decode(x.other_med_date_qual, 'EffectiveDate', nvl(to_date(decode(substr(x.other_med_date,0,INSTR(x.other_med_date,'T')-1),null,x.other_med_date,substr(x.other_med_date,0,INSTR(x.other_med_date,'T')-1)),'YYYY-MM-DD') - to_date(nvl(decode(substr(nvl(x.written_date,x.written_date_time),0,INSTR(nvl(x.written_date,x.written_date_time),'T')-1),null,nvl(x.written_date,x.written_date_time),substr(nvl(x.written_date,x.written_date_time),0,INSTR(nvl(x.written_date,x.written_date_time),'T')-1)),SYSDATE),'YYYY-MM-DD'),2),0) effective_date_test, sysdate receive_date, x.rx_ref_num rx_ref_num, x.pon pon, nvl2(nvl(x.med_pres_drug_desc,x.med_resp_drug_desc), 'true', 'false') med_prescribed_exists from inbound_ncpdp_msg t, xmltable('/Message' passing t.message columns rx_ref_num varchar2(35) path '//Header/RxReferenceNumber', pon varchar2(35) path '//Header/PrescriberOrderNumber', message_id varchar2(35) path '//Header/MessageID', rel_to_message_id varchar2(35) path '//Header/RelatesToMessageID', message_type varchar2(35) path 'name(/Body/*[1])', renewal_type varchar2(35) path 'name(/Body/RxRenewalResponse/Response/*[1])', change_type varchar2(35) path 'name(/Body/RxChangeResponse/Response/*[1])', medication_req_cd varchar2(35) path '//MessageRequestCode', pharmacy_ncpdpid varchar2(30) path '//Header/To', npi1 varchar2(35) path '//Prescriber/NonVeterinarian/Identification/NPI', clinic_id varchar2(35) path '//Header/From', written_date_time varchar2(35) path '//Body/*/*/WrittenDate/DateTime', written_date varchar2(35) path '//Body/*/*/WrittenDate/Date', other_med_date varchar2(35) path '//Body/*/*/OtherMedicationDate/OtherMedicationDate', other_med_date_qual varchar2(35) path '//Body/*/*/OtherMedicationDate/OtherMedicationDateQualifier', med_pres_drug_desc varchar2(35) path '//Body/*/MedicationPrescribed/DrugDescription', med_resp_drug_desc varchar2(35) path '//Body/*/MedicationResponse/DrugDescription', error_desc varchar2(200) path '//Error/Description' ) x where t.message_status = '0000' and t.message is not null

step.name: Provider Check Failure

Provider Check Failure - RPC not reachable 2
Provider Check Failure Allow Retry
Provider Check Failure Allow Retry 2
Provider Check Success
Retry Check
step.send_false_to: Provider Check Failure - RPC not reachable

step.name: Retry Check 2
step.send_false_to: Provider Check Failure - RPC not reachable 2

step.name: Table input
step.sql: select (select value from app_configuration where key = 'ERX_URL')|| (select value from app_configuration where key = 'PRVDRCHK_RS_URI')as url, '{"providerDEANumber":"'||provider_info.deaNumber||'",'|| '"controlledSubstance":"'||decode(provider_info.controlledSubstance,'C48672',1,'C48675',1, 'C48676',1,'C48677',1,'C48679',1,0)||'",'|| '"providerNPI":"'||nvl(provider_info.npi1,provider_info.npi2)||'","division":"${PHARMACY_DIVISION}"}' as body, t.inbound_ncpdp_msg_id inbound_ncpdp_msg_id, (nvl(extractValue(xmltype(nvl(t.provider_match_details,'<providerCheck/>')), '/providerCheck/runCount'),0) + 1) runCount, nvl((select value from app_configuration where key = 'VISTA_RETRY'),0) as retry from erx.inbound_ncpdp_msg t, xmltable('/Message' passing t.message columns deaNumber varchar2(35) path '//Prescriber/NonVeterinarian/Identification/DEANumber', controlledSubstance varchar2(35) path '//DrugCoded/DEASchedule', NPI1 varchar2(35) path '//Prescriber/NonVeterinarian/Identification/NPI', NPI2 varchar2(35) path '//Header/From') provider_info where t.inbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}

error.target_step: Provider Check Failure - RPC not reachable 2

entry.name: Update Status - Auto Check Completed
Update Status - Auto Check Completed
Check for Messages to Process
entry.custom_sql: select t.inbound_ncpdp_msg_id, t.drug_chk_status drug_chk_status, t.provider_chk_status provider_chk_status, t.patient_chk_status patient_chk_status from erx.inbound_ncpdp_msg t where t.message_status = '3001' and t.message is not null and (t.drug_chk_status = '1004' or t.provider_chk_status = '2004' or t.patient_chk_status in ('0004','0107'))

attribute.value: {"namespace":"pentaho","id":"Default Run Configuration","name":"Default Run Configuration","description":"Defines a default run configuration","metaStoreName":null}

entry.name: Check for Messages to Process
entry.custom_sql: select inbound_ncpdp_msg_id from inbound_ncpdp_msg where message_status = '0000' and message is not null

attribute.value: {"namespace":"pentaho","id":"Default Run Configuration","name":"Default Run Configuration","description":"Defines a default run configuration","metaStoreName":null}
